JusKid.in by Jaskaran

Hey there! My name is Jaskaran and I’m a designer, photographer, and video creator. I’ve been involved in Graphic Design for the last 3 years now and I’m currently exploring the world of Interaction Design. I’m currently majoring in Computer Science at BITS Goa, and I’m looking for freelance opportunities. If you like my work, do get in touch on Instagram or through my mail!
